summary: After the death of her mother, a teenage girl is faced with bizarre supernatural occurrences when her mother's estranged sister arrives and begins to infiltrate her and her father's lives.

keywords: younger version of character|murder of a priest|page torn from a book|bare chested man|story telling
title: El beso
